Create account with Nordstrom email \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Connect to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://nordstrom.slack.com/messages/GCREZCG7N\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://nordstrom.slack.com/messages/GCREZCG7N\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or ask to be added to EPAM channel - feel free to ask any questions to EPAM people at Nordstrom.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For more information please visit \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/NDM/Nordstrom+Onboarding+Instruction#NordstromOnboardingInstruction-Accountandconnectivity\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nordstrom Onboarding KB page.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
